text: This is a list of flags used in Europe. == Flags of European countries == Flag Date Use 1912 – Flag of Albania 1866 – Flag of Andorra 1864 \- Flag of Armenia 1918 – 1938 1945 – Flag of Austria 1952 \- Flag of Azerbaijan 2012 – Flag of Belarus 1830 – Flag of Belgium 1998 – Flag of Bosnia and Herzegovina 1878 – 1946 1991 – Flag of Bulgaria 1990 – Flag of Croatia 1993 – Flag of the Czech Republic 1219 – Flag of Denmark 1918 – 1940 1990 – Flag of Estonia 1918 – Flag of Finland 1794 – 1814 1830 – Flag of France 1885 - 1930 Flag of Georgia 1919 – 1933 1949 – Flag of Germany 1978 – Flag of Greece 1957 – Flag of Hungary 1915 – Flag of Iceland 1922 – Flag of Ireland 1948 – Flag of Italy 1996 - 2006 Flag of Kazakhstan 1918 – 1940 1990 – Flag of Latvia 1937 – Flag of Liechtenstein 1918 – 1940 1989 – Flag of Lithuania 1845 – Flag of Luxembourg 1964 – Flag of Malta 1990 – Flag of Moldova 1881 – Flag of Monaco 2007 – Flag of Montenegro 1937 – Flag of the Netherlands 1995 – Flag of North Macedonia 1821 – 1844 1898 – Flag of Norway 1919 – Flag of Poland 1911 – Flag of Portugal 1848, 1867 – 1948 1989 – Flag of Romania 1883 – 1918 1993 – Flag of Russia 2011 – Flag of San Marino 1815 – 1918 2004 – Flag of Serbia 1992 – Flag of Slovakia 1991 – Flag of Slovenia 1981 – Flag of Spain 1569 – Flag of Sweden 1889 – Flag of Switzerland 1825 - 2025 Flag of Turkey 1918 – 1920 1992 – Flag of Ukraine 1801 – Flag of the United Kingdom 1929 – Flag of Vatican City or Holy See These are the flags of the 50 countries in Europe.
title: Flags of Europe
